detailsData.title: Hands-On Management
detailsData.content: At Fang Law Firm, cases are directly handled by attorneys, ensuring personalized and focused legal service from start to finish, without being passed off to paralegals or case managers.

detailsData.title: High Success Rate
detailsData.content: With a 98% success rate for settlements, Fang Law Firm has a proven track record of achieving favorable outcomes for their clients.

detailsData.title: Direct Communication
detailsData.content: Maintaining an open line of communication, Fang Law Firm guarantees to return client calls within 24 hours, ensuring clients are always informed and supported.

detailsData.title: Contingency Fee Basis
detailsData.content: Clients do not pay any legal fees until a settlement is reached or the case is won, aligning the firm's interests with those of their clients.

valueProp: Based in Denver, Colorado, Fang Law Firm is a team of exceptional Denver injury attorneys and staff that are passionate about helping injured people recover from their injuries and restore their lives as much as possible. From the moment that you visit our office or speak to our personal injury lawyers in Denver over the phone, you will get back your peace of mind.
CTA: Click For a Free Consultation Tap For a Free Consultation

testimonalData.text: Remington Fang is a very knowledgeable trustworthy attorney “He has helped me in so many ways, gave me wonderful advice, calmed my nerves, and walked me through my options. I highly recommend him!! Even after my case was handed back to me he still answered any question I had and answered them with no regard to himself. Thank you so much for everything Remington.
testimonalData.author: Shyanne

testimonalData.text: Thank you, Mr. Remington Fang, for a professional experience with your firm Everything worked out in my favor and I appreciate your help in getting me there. If you are looking for a fair and knowledgeable attorney you came to the right place!
testimonalData.author: R. Pleger

testimonalData.text: Remington’s commitment to his clients was unwavering Any friction or issue that arose was resolved expeditiously with his assistance. Remington ensured I received the treatment I needed to facilitate my recovery. I will recommend him to any family member or friend should they too fall victim to an unfortunate circumstance.
testimonalData.author: James W.
